doc.field: Includes Luce III with his wife Claire at Fisher Island (by Ted Bell); younger and older portraits of Luce III (by Nancy Kessler, David Gahr, Robbin Arnold, and others); on stage at the Thomas Jefferson Awards; standing next to Estes Kefauver and other individuals; posing in London (by T. Spencer); receiving an award from Dan O. Henry; wearing a military uniform with HRL at a Pan Am party; together with HRL holding a dead goose; together with HRL sitting in front of a large map; in naval uniform before going on convoy service; as a teenager next to another boy (Peter Paul Luce?); very young Luce III next to a small child (Peter Paul Luce?); raising a gun next to an instructor?; with other children at HRL's Mepkin estate; aboard a boat; and individual photos of Mrs. Henry Luce III.
Series IX. Photographs >> Luce, Henry III
